attributes.action: Minimise sexual content in the media (TV/Magazines/Billboards etc)
attributes.additional_details:
Young children are exposed to sexual content daily by the media. This is causing problems of underage sex and pregnancy. Hence family problems.

Minimising the sexual content in the media will minimise the desire in children experiencing these sort of things at such a young age. More educational and intellectual advertisement should be encouraged, rather than sexualisation of women and men.
